title: chestcommands菜单只能op打开，普通玩家不能打开怎么办
author: fred2006
txt_content: chestcommands菜单只能op打开，普通玩家不能打开怎么办

replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content:
fred2006 发表于 2019-8-12 20:15
menu-settings:
  name: '&c&l欢乐之巅&6-&b(功能菜单)'
  command: menu
给组权限的命令为  /mangaddp 组名 权限节点

组名默认填builder就可以了

replies.author: 世予予
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.txt_content:

给过权限了吗
什么权限？？？

replies.author: 世予予
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content:
需要给予玩家打开菜单相应权限

节点：chestcommands.open.菜单名.yml

replies.author: fred2006
replies.txt_content:

replies.author: fred2006
replies.txt_content:
skyliye 发表于 2019-8-12 20:19
给组权限的命令为  /mangaddp 组名 权限节点

组名默认填builder就可以了
/mangaddp builder chestcommands.item.主菜单.yml 这样打没用啊
